statements: SELECT * FROM concert_sponsors;
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsor_type FROM concert_sponsors WHERE sponsor_type = 'Platinum';
SELECT sponsor_id, sponsor_name, partnership_start_date FROM concert_sponsors ORDER BY partnership_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM concert_sponsors WHERE partnership_end_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(sponsor_id) AS total_sponsors FROM concert_sponsors;
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsor_type FROM concert_sponsors WHERE partnership_end_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM concert_sponsors WHERE partnership_start_date < '2021-06-15' AND sponsor_type = 'Platinum'
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsorship_duration_in_days = DATEDIFF(partnership_end_date, partnership_start_date) FROM concert_sponsors WHERE sponsor_type LIKE '%Gold%'
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsorship_cost = CASE WHEN sponsor_type = 'Gold' THEN 5000 WHEN sponsor_type = 'Platinum' THEN 10000 ELSE 2000 END FROM concert_sponsors
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsor_type FROM concert_sponsors ORDER BY partnership_start_date DESC, sponsorship_cost ASC
SELECT * FROM ConcertSponsors;
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsor_contact FROM ConcertSponsors;
SELECT partnership_id, partner_name, partnership_type FROM Partnerships;
SELECT sponsor_id, sponsor_name, sponsor_contact FROM ConcertSponsors ORDER BY sponsor_name ASC;
SELECT partnership_id, partner_name, partnership_type FROM Partnerships WHERE partnership_status = 'Active';
SELECT sponsor_name FROM ConcertSponsors WHERE sponsor_id = 1;
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsor_contact FROM ConcertSponsors WHERE sponsor_name LIKE '%A%';
SELECT * FROM Partnerships WHERE partnership_type = 'Platinum' ORDER BY partnership_id DESC;
SELECT sponsor_name, partner_name FROM ConcertSponsors JOIN Partnerships ON ConcertSponsors.sponsor_id = Partnerships.sponsor_id WHERE partnership_status = 'Active';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalPartnerships FROM Partnerships WHERE sponsorship_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM concert_sponsors;
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsor_contact FROM concert_sponsors;
SELECT partnership_type, start_date, end_date FROM sponsor_partnerships;
SELECT sponsor_id, start_date, end_date FROM sponsor_partnerships ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT sponsorship_amount, sponsorship_level FROM partnership_details WHERE sponsorship_amount > 500.00;
SELECT * FROM concert_sponsors;
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsor_contact FROM concert_sponsors ORDER BY sponsor_name DESC;
SELECT partnership_id, start_date, end_date FROM sponsor_partnerships WHERE partnership_type = 'Gold';
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsorship_amount FROM concert_sponsors JOIN partnership_details ON concert_sponsors.sponsor_id = partnership_details.sponsor_id WHERE sponsorship_level = 'Platinum';
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsor_contact, start_date, end_date FROM concert_sponsors CROSS JOIN sponsor_partnerships ON concert_sponsors.sponsor_id = sponsor_partnerships.sponsor_id;
SELECT * FROM sponsors
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsor_type FROM sponsors WHERE sponsor_type = 'Gold'
SELECT partner_name, start_date, end_date FROM partnerships WHERE partnership_type = 'Exclusive'
SELECT sponsor_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM sponsors WHERE sponsor_id = 1
SELECT * FROM sponsorship_log ORDER BY log_date DESC
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsor_type FROM sponsors
SELECT partner_name, partnership_type FROM partnerships ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT sponsor_name, partnership_type FROM sponsors s JOIN sponsor_partnerships sp ON s.sponsor_id = sp.sponsor_id JOIN partnerships p ON sp.partnership_id = p.partnership_id
SELECT DISTINCT sponsor_name, partner_name FROM sponsors s JOIN sponsor_partnerships sp ON s.sponsor_id = sp.sponsor_id JOIN partnerships p ON sp.partnership_id = p.partnership_id

SELECT sponsor_name, partner_name, sponsorship_amount FROM sponsors s JOIN sponsor_partnerships sp ON s.sponsor_id = sp.sponsor_id JOIN partnerships p ON sp.partnership_id = p.partnership_id ORDER BY sponsorship_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM sponsors;
SELECT sponsor_id, name, address FROM sponsors ORDER BY name;
SELECT partnership_id, start_date, end_date FROM partnerships WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT sponsor_id, partner_id FROM partnership_requests WHERE status='pending';
SELECT partner_id, name, contact_person, contact_email FROM partners;
SELECT * FROM sponsors WHERE sponsor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, address FROM sponsors WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM partnerships WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT sponsors.name, partners.name AS partner_name, partnership_requests.status FROM sponsors INNER JOIN partnerships ON sponsors.sponsor_id = partnerships.sponsor_id INNER JOIN partners ON partnerships.partner_id = partners.partner_id INNER JOIN partnership_requests ON partnerships.sponsor_id = partnership_requests.sponsor_id AND partnerships.partner_id = partnership_requests.partner_id;

SELECT sponsor_log.timestamp, sponsor_log.action, sponsors.name AS sponsor_name FROM sponsor_log INNER JOIN partnerships ON sponsor_log.sponsorship_id = partnerships.partner_id INNER JOIN sponsors ON partnerships.sponsor_id = sponsors.sponsor_id;
